New Records: Arizona Diamondbacks reached their first World Series in 22 years
Kevin Ginkel had a perfect game in the 7th inning
Key Match Events: Diamondbacks scored 4 runs in the bottom of the 9th inning
Corbin Carroll had a crucial sacrifice fly to score a run
Diamondbacks made key defensive plays to secure the victory
Post-Match Reflections: Diamondbacks' manager Torey Lovullo expressed pride in the team's comeback win
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game was played at Citizens Bank Park with a crowd of over 45,000 fans
Diamondbacks' win marked the end of a long playoff drought
Others: Game was the seventh and final game of the NLCS, with the Diamondbacks clinching the series 4-3
